document.full_text: britain's andy murray lost his serve five times but still overcame xavier malisse 6-2 2-6 6-3 to reach the third round of the rome masters on tuesday.
document.title: murray and soderling stumble through to last 16 in rome
lines_and_colors: britain's andy murray lost his serve five times but still overcame xavier malisse 6-2 2-6 6-3 to reach the third round of the rome masters on tuesday.
